attributes.action: Stop the closure of East Midlands Congenital Heart Centre (Glenfield)
attributes.additional_details:
Clinical outcomes for patients are among the best in the country, cancellation rates are better than the national average and patient and family satisfaction rates is 99%!!

The unit is only one of a handful which has an extra corporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) service, providing 50% of all capacity nationally.

Paediatric intensive care services located at Leicester Royal Infirmary, which are supported by the EMCHC, would also be under threat, with their viability seriously compromised.
attributes.background: NHS England are looking to cease children's heart surgery at Leicester’s Glenfield Hospital.
